name: Escape From Lavender Island
description:
Features:
  • An open world map with 5 neighborhoods packed with unique characters, tasks, missions, upgrades and achievements
  • A unique soundtrack by Chris Parrello
  • A feature length movie simulation
  • Over an hour of narration describing the lives of the citizens of Lavender Island
  • Full controller support
  • Aliens with two butts and two mouths



Zede Aksis wakes up in his prison cell college dormitory from a dream about an absurd island city. In the dream, citizens wander aimlessly about, clueless to the fact that their environs are being slowly colonized by Lavender Corporation, an evil group from the mainland that is working with an alien civilization to control the island and everyone who lives on it.



Zede escapes his cell only to discover his dream has inexplicably become a reality and he is forced to live inside it. Help Zede wander through Lavender Corporate City by collecting masks with different abilities and ships that help enable him to move quickly from neighborhood to neighborhood as he engages with Lavender’s inhabitants, falls in love, and uncovers layers of lore revolving around the island’s mysterious history and various cultures.
